subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: There is an unsettling sense that Kentucky’s basketball universe is out of whack, with former Wildcats’ Coach Rick Pitino preparing Louisville for the N.C.A.A. tournament in his old backyard.
snippet: There is an unsettling sense that Kentucky’s basketball universe is out of whack, with former Wildcats’ Coach Rick Pitino preparing Louisville for the N.C.A.A. tournament in his old backyard.
